stochastic_function: lambda launch_decision, market_demand, competitor_pricing, production_difficulty: {1: 1.0 if launch_decision == 'launch' and market_demand == 'high' else (0.5 if launch_decision == 'launch' and market_demand == 'neutral' and competitor_pricing == 'high' else (0.3 if launch_decision == 'launch' and (market_demand == 'neutral' or market_demand == 'low') and production_difficulty == 'low' else 0.1)), 0: 0.5 if launch_decision == 'launch' and market_demand == 'neutral' and competitor_pricing != 'high' else (0.7 if launch_decision == 'launch' and (market_demand == 'neutral' or market_demand == 'low') and production_difficulty != 'low' else 0.9), -1: 0.4 if launch_decision == 'launch' and market_demand != 'high' and competitor_pricing != 'high' and production_difficulty != 'low' else (0.1 if launch_decision == 'launch' and market_demand != 'high' and competitor_pricing == 'high' and production_difficulty != 'low' else 0.0)} if launch_decision == 'not launch' else {0: 1.0}
